tool_description: Cleans a HTML code to give only clean and useful text.
name: JustReadIt
title: JustReadIt

api_list.name: HTML text
api_list.description: Receives some HTML text and returns a clean version. Please add a  `Content-Type: text/html` header.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://justreadit.p.rapidapi.com/text/html"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "justreadit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://justreadit.p.rapidapi.com/text/html"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "justreadit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
